name: wav-to-mp3-encoder-with-node.js
description: Encode all your wav files to mp3

scripts.cleanMp3: npm run cleanMp3:rm && npm run cleanMp3:mkdir && echo Done: the ./mp3 directory is clean !
scripts.cleanWav: npm run cleanWav:rm && npm run cleanWav:mkdir && echo Done: the ./wav directory is clean !

author: Drozerah
